body.name: Office Chair, High Back Desk Chair Adjustable Height and Ergonomic Design Home Office Computer Chair Executive Lumbar Support Padded Flip-up Armrest Swivel Task Chair
features: Ultimate Comfort: Experience unparalleled comfort with CYKOV's office chair high resilience foam, providing optimal support and cushioning for long hours of sitting.
Luxurious Leather Seat: Indulge in the plush comfort of the CYKOV high-back desk chair's premium leather seat, offering a sleek and sophisticated look while ensuring durability and easy maintenance.

Adjustable Recline and Lock: Find your perfect position with the 90-135-degree tilt lock mechanism, this adjustable chair allows you to customize your seating angle for relaxation or focus during work.

Flip-Up Armrests: The CYKOV ergonomic computer chair features convenient flip-up armrests, providing flexibility and freedom of movement. Flip them up to save space or flip them down to rest your arms comfortably.
5-Year Warranty: We stand behind the quality and durability of our products. Enjoy peace of mind with our 5-year warranty, ensuring that your investment is protected and supported.
Quick and Easy Installation: With a simple and straightforward assembly process, the CYKOV executive chair can be installed in just 30 minutes, saving you time and effort.

4-Inch Height Adjustment: Customize your seating experience with the 4-inch height adjustment feature. Easily adjust the task chair's height to match your desk or work surface, promoting proper posture and reducing strain.

Experience Seamless Mobility and Versatility: With its 360-degree swivel feature, you can effortlessly rotate and pivot in any direction, allowing you to reach items around your desk or engage in collaborative discussions without missing a beat. Say goodbye to the limitations of fixed-position chairs and embrace the freedom of movement that our swivel chair provides.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very impressive office chair . . .
reviews.reviewText: This review will address packaging/shipping/delivery, parts, assembly, function & usage, and overall impressions.Packaging: Double-boxed (very sturdy manufacturer/CYKOV box fits snugly inside a heavy-duty Amazon box), both fully intact; no visible damage, watermarks, etc. No shipping or delivery issues.Parts: All parts are present, individually packaged and depicted in photos in an assembly instructions booklet. The welds on the steel base look good. White cotton gloves are included--a nice touch of class. Small parts (screws. bolts, washers, etc.) to include a 5mm T-handled Allen wrench, are vacuum sealed on a blister pack card.Now here's a very nice consideration on the part of the manufacturer, CYKOV; each of the fasteners (bolts, screws, etc,) includes an extra one in its respective blister pack--now that's proactive customer service, and very appreciated. I didn't lose any in the ensuing assembly process--but, I'll admit to having been there on occasion.Assembly: The assembly instructions booklet is very clear and overall very good. All parts are identified in photos. Following the step-by-step instructions w/photos is not the least bit challenging. You need no more tools or fasteners than what are provided. One thing I found that was not mentioned in the instruction booklet was that the right-side arm and bracket, each bagged separately, were each secured with yellow tape on their protective bags--no doubt to differentiate from the left-side arm and bracket which were secured with clear tape. Very thoughtful, that likely precludes a potential mix-up during assembly. Following the instructions, full assembly took me less than one hour (including a leisurely coffee break).Function & Usage: Seat padding is firm, but comfortable; padding on the arms is less firm, yet quite good. The overall range of motion is as expected; the 360* rotation and rocking (fore & aft) are smooth. Hydraulic elevation (up & down) is firm and consistent. The actuator arm can also move in/out to lock/unlock the hydraulic cylinder, and can even lock in a reclining position. Reclining resistance is, of course, adjustable. No matter the attitude of the position, the chair feels very stable. For routine office applications, this chair will meet all needs in a firm yet comfortable manner. The adjustable lumbar is wider and more supportive than I expected--very well done. Overall I find this chair quite comfortable, especially as it encourages good posture and thus tends to diminish stiffness and fatigue.On a personal note . . . For me, as a guitarist, the flip-up arms are a godsend. It's tough to maintain good posture during extended practice/playing sessions when the lower bout of your instrument is constantly bumping a fixed armrest. Now I don't have to give that perpetual annoyance a second thought. Yes, I am very pleased with this chair. If you are in need of such a versatile chair, this one will not disappoint.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good back support chair
reviews.reviewText: It’s very easy assembly. My husband took 25 minutes to put it together. I found the chair has another small piece of cushion at the back. It’s very comfortable and provides good lumbar support. Moreover the sitting pad is made of leather. It’s fancy and easy clean-up. I can flip up the armrest so that it can save the space. Also it’s sturdy and very easy to move around.I like this new chair!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy assembly, comfortable chair, good quality
reviews.reviewText: I've bought a few chairs over the years on Amazon and this is one of the better ones. It's super easy to assemble (evident by the very few small parts - pic attached). Start to finish it took me about 15 minutes to put together!Quality is great for this price range and i like that the chair has very good range to rise and drop. It feels sturdy and I expect it to last. I also personally enjoy that it doesn't have any extraneous unneeded adjustments that I never use and really only serve to potentially raise the price.In short, great chair, good price, easy assembly! Recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I like it!
reviews.reviewText: This chair is exactly what it says. It’s a very nice chair with the basic functions that you need. I do like the nice large, comfortable seat and the ventilated back rest. I also like the 5 wheel base. It is very heavy duty. I’m not exactly sure, but it seems that the chair height goes a little higher than other chairs that I have used. I do like the extra height. The chair was well packaged and the hardware well organized. I also really like the t-handle wrench that is included. It made the assembly much easier. Over all, I like it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A really good quality and comfortable chair!
reviews.reviewText: I love this chair! It was easy to assemble with the allen wrench that has a handle! I like the sage green color that I chose. It's very comfortable for all day use. The arm rests are a comfortable height and it moves and swivels easily. I'm 5' 3" and my husband is 5'10" and we both feel like it's a comfortable fit. I like that it's sturdy and strong and no pet hair sticks to the seat. I highly recommend this chair and the seller stands behind their products also!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So far this chair is pretty great for the money. A definite improvement from previous models by this company, which I’ve purchased in the past. Main improvement in the seat cushion area, it’s thick & comfortable!I’m giving it 5 stars for these reasons: The assembly was easy, due to very clear instructions, down to the bubble packed parts with clear labeling.This company excels at customers service and clear communication. They have helped me in the past when I had problems with a previous chair, made every whole for me, easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars comfortable and good looking
reviews.reviewText: This chair has very good quality and it is very comfortable to sit on it. I bought the white model and the seat surface is leather and easy to clean. As a guy WFH who sits in front of a computer for an average of 8 hours a day, lumbar support helps me a lot. This is one of the best $100 I have ever invested.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All around great for the price!
reviews.reviewText: I've been through a lot of office chairs over the years and this one is more comfortable than some of the chairs that cost twice a much. The seat pad is firm, but still soft enough that you can sit in it for hours without discomfort. The arm rests actually have decent padding too. If you're the kind of person who rest on their elbows, then this is the best budget chair for avoiding elbow fatigue.The chair is also very easy to put together. It comes with everything needed for assembly in the box. I was able to put the chair together solo in about 15 minutes with little effort. Definitely worth it!
